==Japanese==
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{wikipedia|Coral reef}}
[[File:Maldives_small_island.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|珊瑚礁}} (''sango shō''): an [[atoll]] formed from a [[coral reef]]]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|さん|ご|しょう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=さんごしょう|珊瑚|tr1=sango|t1=coral|礁|tr2=shō|t2=reef}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|さんご しょう|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|ja|サンゴ礁}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さんご しょう|hhira=さんごせう}}

# a [[coral reef]]

====Usage notes====
As with many biology terms, the ''sango'' part is more commonly written in [[katakana]], as {{l|ja|サンゴ}}. However, due to the large number of [[homophone]]s in Japanese, dictionaries will often list such terms under the [[kanji]] spelling for [[disambiguation]] purposes.
